bioconda.name: rapsearch
bioconda.summary: RAPSearch2 is a tool for fast protein similarity searches.

biocontainers.summary: RAPSearch2 is a tool for fast protein similarity searches.

biotools.summary: Fast protein similarity search tool for short reads that utilizes a reduced amino acid alphabet and suffix array to detect seeds of flexible length.
